mapper.insert: insert into t_backuplog (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OPERATION, REALNAME, STATUS, TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_backuplog set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATION = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OPERATION, REALNAME, STATUS, TIME from t_backuplog where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OPERATION, REALNAME, STATUS, TIME from t_backuplog
